FuncDef:
The mask severity command enables a device to filter out an alarm with specific severity.
The undo mask severity command disables a device to filter out an alarm with specific severity.
By default, alarms are not masked.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies Major as the severity of an alarm.
-

Specifies Minor as the severity of an alarm.
-

Specifies Warning as the severity of an alarm.
-

Specifies Critical as the severity of an alarm.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can filter out alarms with specific severity that you are not concerned about.
Prerequisites
The alarm filtering table exists.
Configuration Impact
The mask severity command can be repeatedly run to filter out multiple alarms with different severity.
